title: Where do you see your champion mastery grade after a game in the new client?

replies.body:
It displays the same way, in the post-game lobby. You simply have to hover over the champion portrait for your grade, as shown below:

https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/articles/LCU/2016/april/r2pl/img/Scoreboard_0014_2_DevBlog.jpg

Let me know if you have any questions.
Where can you see your champion pool like you could in the previous client? I can only see my top three.
